title: Such a Night
lyrics:
It was a night... oh what a night!
It was it really was such a night!
Oh the moon was bright oh how so bright
It was it really was such a night
Oh the night was alight with stars above
When she kissed me I had to fall in love



It was a kiss oh what a kiss

It was it really was such a kiss

Oh how she could kiss oh what a kiss

It was it really was such a kiss

Just the thought of her lips sets me afire

I reminisce and I'm filled with desire



But I'd give my heart to her in sweet surrender

How well I remember, I'll always remember

Oh, what a night oh

It was it really was such a night

Came the dawn and my heart and her love

And the night was gone

But I'll never forget, forget the kiss in the moonlight

Oh such a kiss, oh such a night!



Oh what a night, oh what a night!

It was it really was such a night!

Oh the moon was bright oh how bright

It was it really was such a night

But I'll never forget, forget the kiss in the moonlight

How well I remember, I'll always remember



But I'd give my heart to her in sweet surrender

How well I remember, I'll always remember

Oh that night, oh what a night!

It was it really was such a night

When we kissed I had to fall in love



Well she's gone, gone, gone

Yes she's gone, gone, gone

Came the dawn, dawn, dawn

And my love was gone

But before that dawn

Yes before that dawn 

And before that dawn

Oh hmmm oooh... such a night!
